DOC.brief_summary: This study test effectiveness two distinct treatment weight loss : 1 . Motivational Interviewing 2 . Nutritional Counseling . These treatment compare Treatment Usual . Participants recruit local primary care office .
DOC.brief_title: Internet Treatment Weight Loss Primary Care
DOC.criteria: BMI 2555 Daily access internet phone Coexisting physical and/or psychiatric condition require significant treatment ( e.g. , bipolar disorder , psychotic illness ) , and/or require intensive treatment hospitalization ( e.g. , suicidality , severe mood disorder ) Meets criteria current substance abuse dependence Currently receive psychiatric , psychological , behavioral , pharmacologic treatment know affect weight eat Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant treatment period Cardiac disease , include ischemic heart disease , congestive heart failure , conduction abnormality , history heart attack Serious neurologic illness ( e.g. , seizure history ) medical illness ( e.g. , impaired hepatic renal function ) Uncontrolled diabetes , thyroid condition , hypertension
